sentence.Network_en: Whitney Houston wore a skintight gown at the Grammys.
sentence.Network_cn: 惠特妮·斯敦(:美国著名黑人灵歌女歌手)葛莱美奖(:世界通俗乐坛的最高奖项之一)授奖式上穿了一件紧身长裙.

sentence.Network_en: Next morning, a beautiful woman in a skintight exercise suit knocked on the man's door.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二天早晨, 一位身穿紧身运动服的漂亮女人敲响了胖男人的房门.

entry.def: Skin-tight clothes fit very tightly so that they show the shape of your body.

example.ex: ...the youth with the slicked down hair and skin-tight trousers.
example.tran: 头发油光发亮、穿着紧身裤的年轻人

means.word_mean: 1. so tight as to cling to the skin;

auth_sentence.content: "I imagined her skinny in a skintight suit," Lewis said.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I imagined her skinny in a skintight suit," Lewis said.
